name: Tenebris (GenGames)
description:
Gen Games

Welcome to the Tenebris Voyager, a sci-fi action horror game where you try to escape a corrupted space hulk from zombies and an unknown otherwordly being. This game will be released episodically with updated gameplay and features for each episode.

Controls

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys

Rotate/Look - Mouse Controls

Interaction/Pick Up - 'E' key

Attack/Shoot - Mouse 1/ Left Click

Pause -  'esc' key

Close UI Menu/Screen - 'esc' key or Close Button

Weapon equip/swap - '1' Key, Equips Melee;     '2' Key, Equips sidearm;    '3' Key, Equips Rifle

Weapon Reload - 'R' Key

Inventory - 'I' Key/left tab
